17355.en:
<start_lip_sync n00210 _normal m00001>You came <pc>. I was waiting
for YOU!<stop_lip_animation n00210 CLOSE_MOUTH>
17355.ja:
<start_lip_sync n00210 _normal m00001>「来てくれたか　<pc>……。
　キミのことを待っていた！<stop_lip_animation n00210 CLOSE_MOUTH>
17355.ko:
<start_lip_sync n00210 _normal m00001>: 와 주었군, <pc>…….
　널 기다리고 있었다!<stop_lip_animation n00210 CLOSE_MOUTH>
17355.zh-Hans:
<start_lip_sync n00210 _normal m00001>总算来了啊，<pc>……
我一直在等着你！<stop_lip_animation n00210 CLOSE_MOUTH>
17355.zh-Hant:
<start_lip_sync n00210 _normal m00001>總算來了啊，<pc>……
我一直在等著你！<stop_lip_animation n00210 CLOSE_MOUTH>

17356.en:
<start_lip_sync n00210 _normal m00001>Rijin! Call the warriors! We will now
hold a war council! Gather in the
strategy meeting room immediately!<stop_lip_animation n00210 CLOSE_MOUTH>
17356.ja:
<start_lip_sync n00210 _normal m00001>「リジン！！　戦士たちを呼べ！
　これより軍議を行う！
　ただちに　作戦会議室に　集うのだ！！<stop_lip_animation n00210 CLOSE_MOUTH>
17356.ko:
<start_lip_sync n00210 _normal m00001>: 리딜!! 전사들을 불러라!
　지금부터 군사 회의를 열겠다!
　즉시 작전 회의실로 모이도록!!<stop_lip_animation n00210 CLOSE_MOUTH>
17356.zh-Hans:
<start_lip_sync n00210 _normal m00001>里金！！召集战士们！
即刻举行军事会议！在作战会议室集合！<stop_lip_animation n00210 CLOSE_MOUTH>
17356.zh-Hant:
<start_lip_sync n00210 _normal m00001>瑞金！！召集戰士們！
接下來要舉行軍事會議！
叫大家立刻到作戰會議室集合！！<stop_lip_animation n00210 CLOSE_MOUTH>

17358.en:
! First, some good news. The work of the Warriors of Valhalla has revealed the whereabouts of one of
the Three Wise Men!
17358.ja:
<start_lip_sync n00210 _normal m00001>「<pc>！　まずは　朗報だ。
　ヴァルハラの戦士たちの　はたらきにより
　三賢人の　ひとりの居場所が　明らかとなった！<stop_lip_animation n00210 CLOSE_MOUTH>
17358.ko:
<start_lip_sync n00210 _normal m00001>: <pc>! 우선 좋은 소식이 있다.
　발할라의 전사들이 활약한 덕에
　삼현인 중 한 명의 위치가 밝혀졌다!<stop_lip_animation n00210 CLOSE_MOUTH>
17358.zh-Hans:
<start_lip_sync n00210 _normal m00001><pc>！有好消息了。
瓦尔哈拉的战士们不辞劳苦，
总算是找出三贤人之一的所在地了！<stop_lip_animation n00210 CLOSE_MOUTH>
17358.zh-Hant:
<start_lip_sync n00210 _normal m00001><pc>！有好消息了。
瓦爾哈拉的戰士們不辭勞苦，
總算是找出三賢人之一的所在地了！<stop_lip_animation n00210 CLOSE_MOUTH>

17359.en:
The Three Wise Men are the crystallization of wisdom that will stand with us, the warriors of
Valhalla, in the coming Final War.
17359.ja:
<start_lip_sync n00233 _normal m00001>「三賢人とは　来たるべき最終戦争の際
　我ら　ヴァルハラの戦士と共に　立つといわれる
　英知の結晶に　ございます。<stop_lip_animation n00233 CLOSE_MOUTH>
17359.ko:
<start_lip_sync n00233 _normal m00001>: 삼현인은 다가올 최종 전쟁에서
　우리 발할라의 전사와 나란히 설
　지혜의 결정체입니다.<stop_lip_animation n00233 CLOSE_MOUTH>
17359.zh-Hans:
<start_lip_sync n00233 _normal m00001>三贤人乃是在未来面对最终战争之际，
与我等瓦尔哈拉的战士共同奋战的
睿智的结晶。<stop_lip_animation n00233 CLOSE_MOUTH>
17359.zh-Hant:
<start_lip_sync n00233 _normal m00001>三賢人乃是睿智的結晶，
在未來面對最終戰爭之際，
會與我等瓦爾哈拉的戰士共同奮戰。<stop_lip_animation n00233 CLOSE_MOUTH>

17360.en:
<start_lip_sync n00233 _normal m00001>They are the wise men who each possess
power, love and light. The one who has
been located is Sage Thor of Chikara.<stop_lip_animation n00233 CLOSE_MOUTH>
17360.ja:
<start_lip_sync n00233 _normal m00001>「彼らは　それぞれ　チカラと　愛　そして光を
　つかさどる賢人。こたび　居場所が判明したのは
　チカラの賢人トールでございます。<stop_lip_animation n00233 CLOSE_MOUTH>
17360.ko:
<start_lip_sync n00233 _normal m00001>: 각각 힘과 사랑 그리고 빛을 관장하는
　삼현인 중 이번에 위치가 확인된 것은
　힘의 현인 토르입니다.<stop_lip_animation n00233 CLOSE_MOUTH>
17360.zh-Hans:
<start_lip_sync n00233 _normal m00001>他们分别执掌力、爱以及光。
此次找到的是
力之贤人托尔。<stop_lip_animation n00233 CLOSE_MOUTH>
17360.zh-Hant:
<start_lip_sync n00233 _normal m00001>他們分別執掌力、愛以及光。
此次找到的是
力之賢人索爾。<stop_lip_animation n00233 CLOSE_MOUTH>

17361.en:
So, it turns out that this Sage Thor of power is on what the Titans call the Utopia of this world, the Island
of Recreation.
17361.ja:
<start_lip_sync n00231 _normal m00001>「……で　その　チカラの賢人トールは
　巨人族が　この世の楽園と呼ぶ
　娯楽の島とやらにいることが　わかったんでさ。<stop_lip_animation n00231 CLOSE_MOUTH>
17361.ko:
<start_lip_sync n00231 _normal m00001>: ……그리고 힘의 현인 토르는
　거인족이 지상 낙원이라 부르는
　오락의 섬인지 뭔지에 있다는 걸 알아냈습니다.<stop_lip_animation n00231 CLOSE_MOUTH>
17361.zh-Hans:
<start_lip_sync n00231 _normal m00001>……这位力之贤人托尔出现在
巨人族称为尘世间乐园的
娱乐之岛上。<stop_lip_animation n00231 CLOSE_MOUTH>
17361.zh-Hant:
<start_lip_sync n00231 _normal m00001>……我們查到這位力之賢人索爾，
人就在巨人族稱之為
現世樂園的娛樂島上。<stop_lip_animation n00231 CLOSE_MOUTH>

17362.en:
One problem is that the island of amusement is an incredibly remote place. Who should go to the island of
amusement?
17362.ja:
<start_lip_sync n00231 _normal m00001>「ひとつ問題なのは　その娯楽の島が
　途方もなく　遠方の地だってことでして。
　誰が　娯楽の島へ行くべきか……。<stop_lip_animation n00231 CLOSE_MOUTH>
17362.ko:
<start_lip_sync n00231 _normal m00001>: 한 가지 문제는 그 오락의 섬이
　터무니없이 먼 곳이라는 겁니다.
　누가 오락의 섬에 가야 할지…….<stop_lip_animation n00231 CLOSE_MOUTH>
17362.zh-Hans:
<start_lip_sync n00231 _normal m00001>不过有一个问题。
那娱乐之岛与此地相隔甚远，
派谁过去呢……<stop_lip_animation n00231 CLOSE_MOUTH>
17362.zh-Hant:
<start_lip_sync n00231 _normal m00001>不過有一個問題。
那娛樂島與此地相隔甚遠，
該派誰過去呢……<stop_lip_animation n00231 CLOSE_MOUTH>

17363.en:
<start_lip_sync n00210 _normal m00001>I've already assigned someone to
search for Sage Thor. I and
<pc> will go!<stop_lip_animation n00210 CLOSE_MOUTH>
17363.ja:
<start_lip_sync n00210 _normal m00001>「賢人トールの　捜索にあたる人員は
　もう　決めてある。
　ボクと　<pc>が行こう！<stop_lip_animation n00210 CLOSE_MOUTH>
17363.ko:
<start_lip_sync n00210 _normal m00001>: 현인 토르 탐색에 투입할 인원은
　이미 결정했지.
　나와 {pc}|hpp(이,가) 간다!<stop_lip_animation n00210 CLOSE_MOUTH>
17363.zh-Hans:
<start_lip_sync n00210 _normal m00001>搜索贤人托尔的人员已定。
就由我和<pc>前往！<stop_lip_animation n00210 CLOSE_MOUTH>
17363.zh-Hant:
<start_lip_sync n00210 _normal m00001>搜索賢人索爾的人員
早已決定。
就由我和<pc>前往！<stop_lip_animation n00210 CLOSE_MOUTH>

17364.en:
Dear Sigurd, please reconsider! You are the leader of the warriors of Valhalla. If something should happen
to you..!
17364.ja:
<start_lip_sync n00233 _normal m00001>「シグルド様　お考え直しを！！
　あなたは　我らヴァルハラの戦士を率いるお方。
　御身に　もしものことが　あっては……！<stop_lip_animation n00233 CLOSE_MOUTH>
17364.ko:
<start_lip_sync n00233 _normal m00001>: 시구르드 님, 다시 생각해 주십시오!!
　우리 발할라의 전사들을 이끄시는 당신께
　무슨 일이라도 생긴다면……!<stop_lip_animation n00233 CLOSE_MOUTH>
17364.zh-Hans:
<start_lip_sync n00233 _normal m00001>希格尔德大人！请三思啊！！
您可是我等瓦尔哈拉的战士的统帅。
如果您有个万一……<stop_lip_animation n00233 CLOSE_MOUTH>
17364.zh-Hant:
<start_lip_sync n00233 _normal m00001>希格爾德大人，請三思啊！！
您可是我等瓦爾哈拉戰士的統帥。
如果您有個萬一……！<stop_lip_animation n00233 CLOSE_MOUTH>

17365.en: <start_lip_sync n00210 _normal m00001>Rijin. You still say that?<stop_lip_animation n00210 CLOSE_MOUTH>
17365.ja: <start_lip_sync n00210 _normal m00001>「リジンよ。まだ　それを言うか。<stop_lip_animation n00210 CLOSE_MOUTH>
17365.ko: <start_lip_sync n00210 _normal m00001>: 리딜, 또 그 소리냐.<stop_lip_animation n00210 CLOSE_MOUTH>
17365.zh-Hans: <start_lip_sync n00210 _normal m00001>里金啊。你又这么说了。<stop_lip_animation n00210 CLOSE_MOUTH>
17365.zh-Hant: <start_lip_sync n00210 _normal m00001>瑞金，你還在說這種話嗎？<stop_lip_animation n00210 CLOSE_MOUTH>

17366.en:
<start_lip_sync n00210 _normal m00001>As a leader, I need to know more about
the world of the Titans! And you're
going to stop me from doing that?<stop_lip_animation n00210 CLOSE_MOUTH>
17366.ja:
<start_lip_sync n00210 _normal m00001>「ボクは　皆を導く指導者として
　巨人族の世界を　深く知っておく必要がある！
　お前は　それを止めようというのか？<stop_lip_animation n00210 CLOSE_MOUTH>
17366.ko:
<start_lip_sync n00210 _normal m00001>: 난 너희를 이끄는 지도자로서
　거인족의 세계를 깊이 알아 둘 필요가 있다!
　넌 그걸 막을 셈이냐?<stop_lip_animation n00210 CLOSE_MOUTH>
17366.zh-Hans:
<start_lip_sync n00210 _normal m00001>为了成为一个合格的领导者，
我必须深入了解巨人族的世界！
你是要阻止我这样做吗？<stop_lip_animation n00210 CLOSE_MOUTH>
17366.zh-Hant:
<start_lip_sync n00210 _normal m00001>身為帶領大家的領導者，
我必須深入瞭解巨人族的世界！
你是要阻止我這樣做嗎？<stop_lip_animation n00210 CLOSE_MOUTH>

17367.en:
<start_lip_sync n00233 _normal m00001>I'm sure it won't be. Well then,
please have a safe trip.<stop_lip_animation n00233 CLOSE_MOUTH>
17367.ja:
<start_lip_sync n00233 _normal m00001>「……めっそうも　ございません。
　では　せめて　お気をつけて
　いってくださいませ。<stop_lip_animation n00233 CLOSE_MOUTH>
17367.ko:
<start_lip_sync n00233 _normal m00001>: ……당치도 않습니다.
　그렇다면 제발 조심해서
　다녀오십시오.<stop_lip_animation n00233 CLOSE_MOUTH>
17367.zh-Hans:
<start_lip_sync n00233 _normal m00001>……绝无此理。
既然如此，
还请您多加保重。<stop_lip_animation n00233 CLOSE_MOUTH>
17367.zh-Hant:
<start_lip_sync n00233 _normal m00001>……絕無此理。
既然如此，
還請您多加保重。<stop_lip_animation n00233 CLOSE_MOUTH>

17368.en:
<start_lip_sync n00210 _normal m00001>Now, Giant Warrior <pc>! Your
role is as I told you earlier.<stop_lip_animation n00210 CLOSE_MOUTH>
17368.ja:
<start_lip_sync n00210 _normal m00001>「さて　巨人族の戦士　<pc>よ！
　キミの役目は　先ほど話したとおりだ。<stop_lip_animation n00210 CLOSE_MOUTH>
17368.ko:
<start_lip_sync n00210 _normal m00001>: 자, 거인족 전사 {pc}|hpp(이여,여)!
　네 역할은 아까 설명한 그대로다.<stop_lip_animation n00210 CLOSE_MOUTH>
17368.zh-Hans:
<start_lip_sync n00210 _normal m00001>巨人族的战士<pc>啊！
你的任务就是这样。<stop_lip_animation n00210 CLOSE_MOUTH>
17368.zh-Hant:
<start_lip_sync n00210 _normal m00001>巨人族的戰士<pc>啊！
你的任務就如同剛才所說的。<stop_lip_animation n00210 CLOSE_MOUTH>

17369.en:
<start_lip_sync n00210 _normal m00001>I want you to go with me to the Island
of Recreation! Let's work together to
find Sage Thor!<stop_lip_animation n00210 CLOSE_MOUTH>
17369.ja:
<start_lip_sync n00210 _normal m00001>「キミには　このボクと　ともに
　娯楽の島に　行ってもらいたい！
　チカラの賢人トールの　捜索に　あたろう！<stop_lip_animation n00210 CLOSE_MOUTH>
17369.ko:
<start_lip_sync n00210 _normal m00001>: 네가 나와 함께
　오락의 섬에 가 주었으면 한다!
　힘의 현인 토르를 탐색하자!<stop_lip_animation n00210 CLOSE_MOUTH>
17369.zh-Hans:
<start_lip_sync n00210 _normal m00001>请和我一起
前往娱乐之岛！
去寻找力之贤人托尔吧。<stop_lip_animation n00210 CLOSE_MOUTH>
17369.zh-Hant:
<start_lip_sync n00210 _normal m00001>請和我一起
前往娛樂島！
尋找力之賢人索爾吧！<stop_lip_animation n00210 CLOSE_MOUTH>

26333.en:
I have been asked to do a quest. Do
you accept this quest?
<select>
Accept
Stop
<select_end><close>
26333.ja:
クエストを　依頼されました。
このクエストを　受けますか？
<select>
うける
やめる
<select_end><close>
26333.ko:
퀘스트 의뢰를 받았습니다.
이 퀘스트를 수락하겠습니까?
<select>
수락하기
그만두기
<select_end><close>
26333.zh-Hans:
对方委托了任务。
要接受这个任务吗？
<select>
接受
放弃
<select_end><close>
26333.zh-Hant:
對方提出了任務委託。
是否要承接這件任務？
<select>
承接
放棄
<select_end><close>

17370.en:
<start_lip_sync n00210 _normal m00001>That's a reassuring reply. With you as
a Giant Tribe, I am sure we will be
able to find Sage Thor of Chikara!<stop_lip_animation n00210 CLOSE_MOUTH>
17370.ja:
<start_lip_sync n00210 _normal m00001>「心強い返事だ。巨人族である
　キミと一緒なら　チカラの賢人トールも
　必ずや　見つけだすことができるだろう！<stop_lip_animation n00210 CLOSE_MOUTH>
17370.ko:
<start_lip_sync n00210 _normal m00001>: 믿음직스러운 대답이군. 거인족인
　너와 함께라면 힘의 현인 토르도
　반드시 찾아낼 수 있겠지!<stop_lip_animation n00210 CLOSE_MOUTH>
17370.zh-Hans:
<start_lip_sync n00210 _normal m00001>说得好。
有身为巨人族的你相助，
必能找到力之贤人托尔！<stop_lip_animation n00210 CLOSE_MOUTH>
17370.zh-Hant:
<start_lip_sync n00210 _normal m00001>說得好。
有身為巨人族的你相助，
必能找到力之賢人索爾！<stop_lip_animation n00210 CLOSE_MOUTH>

26332.ja:
クエスト『<%sEV_QUEST_NAME>』を
受けました。<me 74>

17376.en:
<start_lip_sync n00210 _normal m00001>I see. Then I can't force you. I guess
you have your own reasons.<stop_lip_animation n00210 CLOSE_MOUTH>
17376.ja:
<start_lip_sync n00210 _normal m00001>「そうか……。
　ならば　無理強いすることはできないな。
　キミにも　事情というものが　あるのだろう。<stop_lip_animation n00210 CLOSE_MOUTH>
17376.ko:
<start_lip_sync n00210 _normal m00001>: 그렇군…….
　그렇다면 강요할 수는 없지.
　네게도 사정이라는 게 있을 테니.<stop_lip_animation n00210 CLOSE_MOUTH>
17376.zh-Hans:
<start_lip_sync n00210 _normal m00001>是吗……
这就不能勉强了。
你也有自己要做的事情啊。<stop_lip_animation n00210 CLOSE_MOUTH>
17376.zh-Hant:
<start_lip_sync n00210 _normal m00001>這樣啊……
這就不能勉強了。
想必你也有你的苦衷吧。<stop_lip_animation n00210 CLOSE_MOUTH>

17374.en:
<start_lip_sync n00210 _normal m00001>Mwah! Wait <pc>! It seems you
have numerous other missions.<stop_lip_animation n00210 CLOSE_MOUTH>
17374.ja:
<start_lip_sync n00210 _normal m00001>「むっ！？　待て　<pc>！
　どうやら　キミは　他にも
　多数の使命を　抱えているようだな。<stop_lip_animation n00210 CLOSE_MOUTH>
17374.ko:
<start_lip_sync n00210 _normal m00001>: 음? 잠깐, <pc>!
　아무래도 넌 다른 사명을
　많이 짊어지고 있는 모양이군.<stop_lip_animation n00210 CLOSE_MOUTH>
17374.zh-Hans:
<start_lip_sync n00210 _normal m00001>嗯？！等等<pc>！
你看上去好像
还有很多其他使命没有完成啊。<stop_lip_animation n00210 CLOSE_MOUTH>
17374.zh-Hant:
<start_lip_sync n00210 _normal m00001>嗯！？等等，<pc>！
你似乎還有許多使命
還沒完成啊。<stop_lip_animation n00210 CLOSE_MOUTH>

17375.en:
<start_lip_sync n00210 _normal m00001>First of all, you must complete your
mission. That is the duty of a
warrior.<stop_lip_animation n00210 CLOSE_MOUTH>
17375.ja:
<start_lip_sync n00210 _normal m00001>「まずは　その使命を　まっとうしてくれ。
　それが戦士たる者の　つとめであろう。<stop_lip_animation n00210 CLOSE_MOUTH>
17375.ko:
<start_lip_sync n00210 _normal m00001>: 우선 그 사명부터 처리하도록.
　그것이 전사의 소임일 테니.<stop_lip_animation n00210 CLOSE_MOUTH>
17375.zh-Hans:
<start_lip_sync n00210 _normal m00001>请先去完成那些使命吧。
那也是身为战士的义务。<stop_lip_animation n00210 CLOSE_MOUTH>
17375.zh-Hant:
<start_lip_sync n00210 _normal m00001>請先去完成那些使命吧。
那也是身為戰士的職責。<stop_lip_animation n00210 CLOSE_MOUTH>

17371.en:
<start_lip_sync n00210 _normal m00001>Then let's leave immediately! I'm
going to go into your bag.<stop_lip_animation n00210 CLOSE_MOUTH>
17371.ja:
<start_lip_sync n00210 _normal m00001>「それでは　すぐに　出発しよう！
　ボクは　キミの　かばんの中に入らせてもらう。<stop_lip_animation n00210 CLOSE_MOUTH>
17371.ko:
<start_lip_sync n00210 _normal m00001>: 그럼 즉시 출발하자!
　나는 네 가방 속에 들어가 있겠다.<stop_lip_animation n00210 CLOSE_MOUTH>
17371.zh-Hans:
<start_lip_sync n00210 _normal m00001>事不宜迟，马上出发吧！
请让我进到你的背包里。<stop_lip_animation n00210 CLOSE_MOUTH>
17371.zh-Hant:
<start_lip_sync n00210 _normal m00001>事不宜遲，馬上出發吧！
請讓我進到你的包包裡。<stop_lip_animation n00210 CLOSE_MOUTH>

17372.en: <start_lip_sync n00210 _normal m00001>Everyone! Take care of him!<stop_lip_animation n00210 CLOSE_MOUTH>
17372.ja: <start_lip_sync n00210 _normal m00001>「皆！　留守を　頼んだぞ！！<stop_lip_animation n00210 CLOSE_MOUTH>
17372.ko: <start_lip_sync n00210 _normal m00001>: 내가 없는 동안 모두 잘 부탁한다!!<stop_lip_animation n00210 CLOSE_MOUTH>
17372.zh-Hans: <start_lip_sync n00210 _normal m00001>各位！其他事情就拜托了！！<stop_lip_animation n00210 CLOSE_MOUTH>
17372.zh-Hant: <start_lip_sync n00210 _normal m00001>各位！其他事情就拜託了！！<stop_lip_animation n00210 CLOSE_MOUTH>

19001499.ja:
<pc>は
戦士シグルド（だいじなもの）を　手に入れた！<me 60>
19001499.zh-Hans:
<pc>获得了
战士希格尔德（重要物品）！<me 60>
19001499.zh-Hant:
<pc>獲得了
戰士希格爾德（重要物品）！<me 60>

17377.en: <start_lip_sync n00210 _normal m00001>I'm so glad you're back!<stop_lip_animation n00210 CLOSE_MOUTH>
17377.ja: <start_lip_sync n00210 _normal m00001>「よくぞ　戻ってきてくれた！<stop_lip_animation n00210 CLOSE_MOUTH>
17377.ko: <start_lip_sync n00210 _normal m00001>: 어서 와라!<stop_lip_animation n00210 CLOSE_MOUTH>
17377.zh-Hans: <start_lip_sync n00210 _normal m00001>你回来的太好了！<stop_lip_animation n00210 CLOSE_MOUTH>
17377.zh-Hant: <start_lip_sync n00210 _normal m00001>你回來得太好了！<stop_lip_animation n00210 CLOSE_MOUTH>

17378.en:
I am the Giant Warrior . As I told you before, the location of Sage Thor of Chicara has been
revealed.
17378.ja:
<start_lip_sync n00210 _normal m00001>「巨人族の戦士　<pc>よ。
　以前　話したとおり　チカラの賢人トールの
　居場所が　明らかになったのだ。<stop_lip_animation n00210 CLOSE_MOUTH>
17378.ko:
<start_lip_sync n00210 _normal m00001>: 거인족 전사 {pc}|hpp(이여,여).
　전에 말했다시피 힘의 현인 토르의
　위치를 알아냈다.<stop_lip_animation n00210 CLOSE_MOUTH>
17378.zh-Hans:
<start_lip_sync n00210 _normal m00001>巨人族的战士<pc>啊。
找到以前提过的
力之贤人托尔的下落了。<stop_lip_animation n00210 CLOSE_MOUTH>
17378.zh-Hant:
<start_lip_sync n00210 _normal m00001>巨人族的戰士<pc>啊。
找到以前提過的
力之賢人索爾的下落了。<stop_lip_animation n00210 CLOSE_MOUTH>

17379.en:
<start_lip_sync n00210 _normal m00001>I want you to go with me to the Island
of Recreation! Let's work together to
find Sage Thor!<stop_lip_animation n00210 CLOSE_MOUTH>
17379.ja:
<start_lip_sync n00210 _normal m00001>「キミには　このボクと　ともに
　娯楽の島に　行ってもらいたい！
　チカラの賢人トールの　捜索に　あたろう！<stop_lip_animation n00210 CLOSE_MOUTH>
17379.ko:
<start_lip_sync n00210 _normal m00001>: 네가 나와 함께
　오락의 섬에 가 주었으면 한다!
　힘의 현인 토르를 탐색하자!<stop_lip_animation n00210 CLOSE_MOUTH>
17379.zh-Hans:
<start_lip_sync n00210 _normal m00001>请和我一起
前往娱乐之岛！
去寻找力之贤人托尔吧。<stop_lip_animation n00210 CLOSE_MOUTH>
17379.zh-Hant:
<start_lip_sync n00210 _normal m00001>請和我一起
前往娛樂島！
尋找力之賢人索爾吧！<stop_lip_animation n00210 CLOSE_MOUTH>

19001500.ja:
<pc>は
戦士シグルド（だいじなもの）を　手に入れた！<me 60>

17380.en:
I hear Sigurd's voice from inside the
bag.
17380.ja: かばんの中から　シグルドの声が聞こえる。
17380.zh-Hans: 包里传来希格尔德的声音。
17380.zh-Hant: 從包包裡傳來了希格爾德的聲音。

17381.en:
<start_lip_sync n00210 _normal m00001>It's amazing! This is far beyond my
imagination!<stop_lip_animation n00210 CLOSE_MOUTH>
17381.ja:
<start_lip_sync n00210 _normal m00001>「すばらしい……！
　ボクの想像を　はるかに超えている！<stop_lip_animation n00210 CLOSE_MOUTH>
17381.ko:
<start_lip_sync n00210 _normal m00001>: 굉장하군……!
　내가 상상한 것보다 훨씬 엄청나!<stop_lip_animation n00210 CLOSE_MOUTH>
17381.zh-Hans:
<start_lip_sync n00210 _normal m00001>太棒了！
这远远超过我的想象了啊！<stop_lip_animation n00210 CLOSE_MOUTH>
17381.zh-Hant:
<start_lip_sync n00210 _normal m00001>太棒了……！
這遠遠超乎我的想像！<stop_lip_animation n00210 CLOSE_MOUTH>

17382.en:
This island is the recreation island of the giant tribe! ! I have never seen such beautiful
scenery!
17382.ja:
<start_lip_sync n00210 _normal m00001>「この島が　巨人族の　娯楽の島！
　<pc>！　ボクは　こんなに
　美しい景色を　見たことがない！<stop_lip_animation n00210 CLOSE_MOUTH>
17382.ko:
<start_lip_sync n00210 _normal m00001>: 이 섬이 거인족의 오락의 섬!
　<pc>! 난 이토록
　아름다운 풍경은 처음 봐!<stop_lip_animation n00210 CLOSE_MOUTH>
17382.zh-Hans:
<start_lip_sync n00210 _normal m00001>这就是巨人族的娱乐之岛！
<pc>！
我可是从来没见过这么美的景色啊！<stop_lip_animation n00210 CLOSE_MOUTH>
17382.zh-Hant:
<start_lip_sync n00210 _normal m00001>這就是巨人族的娛樂島！
<pc>！我從沒見過
這麼美麗的景色！<stop_lip_animation n00210 CLOSE_MOUTH>

17383.en: <start_lip_sync n00210 _normal m00001>Mwah! Oh that!<stop_lip_animation n00210 CLOSE_MOUTH>
17383.ja: <start_lip_sync n00210 _normal m00001>「……むっ！？　あ…あれは……！<stop_lip_animation n00210 CLOSE_MOUTH>
17383.ko: <start_lip_sync n00210 _normal m00001>: ……응!? 저… 저건……!<stop_lip_animation n00210 CLOSE_MOUTH>
17383.zh-Hans: <start_lip_sync n00210 _normal m00001>……嗯？！那……那是！<stop_lip_animation n00210 CLOSE_MOUTH>
17383.zh-Hant: <start_lip_sync n00210 _normal m00001>……嗯！？那、那是……！<stop_lip_animation n00210 CLOSE_MOUTH>

17384.en:
<start_lip_sync n00210 _normal m00001>How fortunate! I didn't expect to find
you so soon!<stop_lip_animation n00210 CLOSE_MOUTH>
17384.ja:
<start_lip_sync n00210 _normal m00001>「なんと　幸運なんだ！
　こんなに早く　見つかるとは！<stop_lip_animation n00210 CLOSE_MOUTH>
17384.ko:
<start_lip_sync n00210 _normal m00001>: 어떻게 이런 행운이!
　이토록 빨리 찾을 줄이야!<stop_lip_animation n00210 CLOSE_MOUTH>
17384.zh-Hans:
<start_lip_sync n00210 _normal m00001>这真是何等幸运！
这么快就发现了！<stop_lip_animation n00210 CLOSE_MOUTH>
17384.zh-Hant:
<start_lip_sync n00210 _normal m00001>這真是何等幸運！
這麼快就發現了！<stop_lip_animation n00210 CLOSE_MOUTH>

17385.en:
! Follow that lady! I can feel the vibrations of power even from a distance. That orange-colored one is
Sage Thor!
17385.ja:
<start_lip_sync n00210 _normal m00001>「<pc>！　あの　ご婦人を追ってくれ！
　離れていても感じる　チカラの波動……。
　あのオレンジ色の者こそが　賢人トールだ！<stop_lip_animation n00210 CLOSE_MOUTH>
17385.ko:
<start_lip_sync n00210 _normal m00001>: <pc>! 저 아주머니를 따라가 다오!
　멀리서도 느껴지는 힘의 파동…….
　저 주황색 인물이 바로 현인 토르다!<stop_lip_animation n00210 CLOSE_MOUTH>
17385.zh-Hans:
<start_lip_sync n00210 _normal m00001><pc>！快追上那位女士！
这在远距离也能感应到的力量的波动……
那个穿橙色衣服的人正是贤人托尔！<stop_lip_animation n00210 CLOSE_MOUTH>
17385.zh-Hant:
<start_lip_sync n00210 _normal m00001><pc>！快追上那位女士！
即使有段距離仍能感受到的力量波動……
那個穿橙色衣服的人正是賢人索爾！<stop_lip_animation n00210 CLOSE_MOUTH>

17386.en:
<start_lip_sync n00210 _normal m00001>Sorry to keep you all waiting! It's
me! I'm home now!<stop_lip_animation n00210 CLOSE_MOUTH>
17386.ja:
<start_lip_sync n00210 _normal m00001>「皆　待たせたな！
　ボクだ！　今　帰ったぞ！！<stop_lip_animation n00210 CLOSE_MOUTH>
17386.ko:
<start_lip_sync n00210 _normal m00001>: 제군! 오래 기다렸지?
　내가 왔다! 방금 돌아왔어!!<stop_lip_animation n00210 CLOSE_MOUTH>
17386.zh-Hans:
<start_lip_sync n00210 _normal m00001>大家久候了！
是我！我回来了！！<stop_lip_animation n00210 CLOSE_MOUTH>
17386.zh-Hant:
<start_lip_sync n00210 _normal m00001>讓大家久等了！
是我！我回來了！！<stop_lip_animation n00210 CLOSE_MOUTH>

17387.en:
<start_lip_sync n00233 _normal m00001>Oh! This is Sage Thor of Chikara! What
a godly figure!<stop_lip_animation n00233 CLOSE_MOUTH>
17387.ja:
<start_lip_sync n00233 _normal m00001>「おお……！
　この方が　チカラの賢人トール様！
　なんという神々しき　お姿……！<stop_lip_animation n00233 CLOSE_MOUTH>
17387.ko:
<start_lip_sync n00233 _normal m00001>: 오오……!
　이분이 힘의 현인 토르 님!
　이 얼마나 거룩한 모습인가……!<stop_lip_animation n00233 CLOSE_MOUTH>
17387.zh-Hans:
<start_lip_sync n00233 _normal m00001>哦哦！
这位就是力之贤人托尔大人！
何等神圣的容姿啊……<stop_lip_animation n00233 CLOSE_MOUTH>
17387.zh-Hant:
<start_lip_sync n00233 _normal m00001>喔喔……！
這位就是力之賢人索爾大人！
何等神聖的容姿啊……！<stop_lip_animation n00233 CLOSE_MOUTH>

17388.en: <start_lip_sync n00210 _normal m00001>Crystals of wisdom! Answer my voice!<stop_lip_animation n00210 CLOSE_MOUTH>
17388.ja: <start_lip_sync n00210 _normal m00001>「英知の結晶よ！　我が声に　応えたまえ！<stop_lip_animation n00210 CLOSE_MOUTH>
17388.ko: <start_lip_sync n00210 _normal m00001>: 지혜의 결정체여! 내 목소리에 응답해 다오!<stop_lip_animation n00210 CLOSE_MOUTH>
17388.zh-Hans: <start_lip_sync n00210 _normal m00001>睿智的结晶啊！请回应我的声音！<stop_lip_animation n00210 CLOSE_MOUTH>
17388.zh-Hant: <start_lip_sync n00210 _normal m00001>睿智的結晶啊！請回應我的聲音！<stop_lip_animation n00210 CLOSE_MOUTH>

17389.en:
<start_lip_sync n00210 _normal m00001>To Heaven's command, give your wisdom!
Sage Thor, let there be light in your
eyes!<stop_lip_animation n00210 CLOSE_MOUTH>
17389.ja:
<start_lip_sync n00210 _normal m00001>「天命のもとに　その英知を　捧げよ！
　賢人トール！　その瞳に　光を！<stop_lip_animation n00210 CLOSE_MOUTH>
17389.ko:
<start_lip_sync n00210 _normal m00001>: 천명에 그 지혜를 바쳐라!
　현인 토르! 그 눈동자에 빛을!<stop_lip_animation n00210 CLOSE_MOUTH>
17389.zh-Hans:
<start_lip_sync n00210 _normal m00001>为天命奉献出睿智吧！
贤人托尔！苏醒吧！<stop_lip_animation n00210 CLOSE_MOUTH>
17389.zh-Hant:
<start_lip_sync n00210 _normal m00001>為天命奉獻出睿智！
賢人索爾！甦醒吧！<stop_lip_animation n00210 CLOSE_MOUTH>

17390.ja: <start_lip_sync n00258 _normal m00001>「ううぅ……　ぐ…むう……。<stop_lip_animation n00258 CLOSE_MOUTH>
17390.ko: <start_lip_sync n00258 _normal m00001>: 으으으…… 끄…으응…….<stop_lip_animation n00258 CLOSE_MOUTH>
17390.zh-Hans: <start_lip_sync n00258 _normal m00001>呜呜……呼……呣……<stop_lip_animation n00258 CLOSE_MOUTH>
17390.zh-Hant: <start_lip_sync n00258 _normal m00001>唔唔唔……咕、唔唔……<stop_lip_animation n00258 CLOSE_MOUTH>

17391.en:
<start_lip_sync n00210 _normal m00001>Sage Thor! It's a pleasure to finally
meet you!<stop_lip_animation n00210 CLOSE_MOUTH>
17391.ja:
<start_lip_sync n00210 _normal m00001>「賢人トール！！
　ようやく　あなたに　お会いできた！<stop_lip_animation n00210 CLOSE_MOUTH>
17391.ko:
<start_lip_sync n00210 _normal m00001>: 현인 토르!!
　드디어 당신을 만나게 됐군!<stop_lip_animation n00210 CLOSE_MOUTH>
17391.zh-Hans:
<start_lip_sync n00210 _normal m00001>贤人托尔！！
总算见到您了！<stop_lip_animation n00210 CLOSE_MOUTH>
17391.zh-Hant:
<start_lip_sync n00210 _normal m00001>賢人索爾！！
總算見到您了！<stop_lip_animation n00210 CLOSE_MOUTH>

17392.en:
<start_lip_sync n00258 _normal m00001>It's been a long time since anyone has
called my name. You've been asleep for
a long time.<stop_lip_animation n00258 CLOSE_MOUTH>
17392.ja:
<start_lip_sync n00258 _normal m00001>「ふうむ……　賢人トール……？
　ひさかたぶりに　我が名を呼ばれたわい。
　ずいぶん長く　眠っておったようじゃ……。<stop_lip_animation n00258 CLOSE_MOUTH>
17392.ko:
<start_lip_sync n00258 _normal m00001>: 흐음…… 현인 토르……?
　참으로 오랜만에 내 이름을 듣는구나.
　아주 오랫동안 잠들었던 모양이야…….<stop_lip_animation n00258 CLOSE_MOUTH>
17392.zh-Hans:
<start_lip_sync n00258 _normal m00001>呼……贤人托尔？
好久没人这么叫过我了。
我好像睡了相当长的时间……<stop_lip_animation n00258 CLOSE_MOUTH>
17392.zh-Hant:
<start_lip_sync n00258 _normal m00001>呼……賢人索爾……？
好久沒人這麼叫過我了。
我好像睡了相當長的時間……<stop_lip_animation n00258 CLOSE_MOUTH>

17393.en:
Sage Thor, we need your help! The Fate's War Maiden has been taken, and the balance of the world is beginning
to shift!
17393.ja:
<start_lip_sync n00210 _normal m00001>「賢人トールよ　あなたのチカラを借りたい！
　天命の戦乙女が　連れ去られたために
　世界の均衡が　崩れ始めているのだ！<stop_lip_animation n00210 CLOSE_MOUTH>
17393.ko:
<start_lip_sync n00210 _normal m00001>: 현인 토르여, 당신의 힘을 빌려 주시오!
　천명의 여전사가 끌려가는 바람에
　세계의 균형이 무너지기 시작했소!<stop_lip_animation n00210 CLOSE_MOUTH>
17393.zh-Hans:
<start_lip_sync n00210 _normal m00001>贤人托尔啊，请助我一臂之力吧！
因为天命之女武神被带走，
世界的均衡正在崩溃！<stop_lip_animation n00210 CLOSE_MOUTH>
17393.zh-Hant:
<start_lip_sync n00210 _normal m00001>賢人索爾啊，請助我們一臂之力吧！
由於天命之女武神被帶走，
世界的均衡正在瓦解！<stop_lip_animation n00210 CLOSE_MOUTH>

17394.en: <start_lip_sync n00258 _normal m00001>What the hell? Fate's War Maiden?<stop_lip_animation n00258 CLOSE_MOUTH>
17394.ja: <start_lip_sync n00258 _normal m00001>「な　なんじゃと！？　天命の戦乙女が！？<stop_lip_animation n00258 CLOSE_MOUTH>
17394.ko: <start_lip_sync n00258 _normal m00001>: 뭐, 뭣이!? 천명의 여전사가!?<stop_lip_animation n00258 CLOSE_MOUTH>
17394.zh-Hans: <start_lip_sync n00258 _normal m00001>你……你说什么？！天命之女武神不见了？！<stop_lip_animation n00258 CLOSE_MOUTH>
17394.zh-Hant: <start_lip_sync n00258 _normal m00001>你、你說什麼！？天命之女武神被帶走了！？<stop_lip_animation n00258 CLOSE_MOUTH>

17395.en:
This is not how it is. I must immediately use my divination to locate the remaining three wise men.
I'll take care of that for now.
17395.ja:
<start_lip_sync n00258 _normal m00001>「こうしては　おれん。すぐに　我が占術で
　残りの三賢人の居場所を　明らかにせねば……。
　ひとまず　ワシに　まかせてくれい。<stop_lip_animation n00258 CLOSE_MOUTH>
17395.ko:
<start_lip_sync n00258 _normal m00001>: 이럴 때가 아니지. 당장 나의 점술로
　남은 삼현인의 위치를 알아내야…….
　일단 나만 믿거라.<stop_lip_animation n00258 CLOSE_MOUTH>
17395.zh-Hans:
<start_lip_sync n00258 _normal m00001>这样下去可不行。
交给我好了。
我马上用占卜术把另外两位贤人找出来。<stop_lip_animation n00258 CLOSE_MOUTH>
17395.zh-Hant:
<start_lip_sync n00258 _normal m00001>這樣下去可不行。得立刻用我的占術
查出另外兩名三賢人的下落……
這事就先交給我吧。<stop_lip_animation n00258 CLOSE_MOUTH>

17396.en:
. thanks to YOU, we have taken a big step towards taking back Fate's War Maiden. It's only a small
one, but it's a thank you.
17396.ja:
<start_lip_sync n00210 _normal m00001>「<pc>。キミのおかげで
　天命の戦乙女の奪還に向けて　大きな一歩を
　踏みだせた。わずかだが　これは礼だ。<stop_lip_animation n00210 CLOSE_MOUTH>
17396.ko:
<start_lip_sync n00210 _normal m00001>: <pc>. 네 덕분에
　천명의 여전사 탈환을 향한 첫걸음을
　성큼 뗄 수 있었다. 약소하지만 받아 다오.<stop_lip_animation n00210 CLOSE_MOUTH>
17396.zh-Hans:
<start_lip_sync n00210 _normal m00001><pc>，多亏有你相助，我们朝着夺回
天命之女武神的方向迈出了一大步。
这些东西聊表心意，请收下吧。<stop_lip_animation n00210 CLOSE_MOUTH>
17396.zh-Hant:
<start_lip_sync n00210 _normal m00001><pc>，多虧有你相助，我們朝
奪回天命之女武神邁進了一大步。
這些東西聊表心意，請收下吧。<stop_lip_animation n00210 CLOSE_MOUTH>

42173.ja:
クエスト『<%sEV_QUEST_NAME>』を
クリアしました！
　<update_quedate><open_irai>

17397.en:
<start_lip_sync n00210 _normal m00001>Come to think of it, I've hardly ever
mentioned Fate's War Maiden to YOU.<stop_lip_animation n00210 CLOSE_MOUTH>
17397.ja:
<start_lip_sync n00210 _normal m00001>「……そういえば　キミには　天命の戦乙女の話を
　ほとんど　したことがなかったな。<stop_lip_animation n00210 CLOSE_MOUTH>
17397.ko:
<start_lip_sync n00210 _normal m00001>: ……그러고 보니 네게는 천명의 여전사에 대한
　이야기를 거의 하지 않았군.<stop_lip_animation n00210 CLOSE_MOUTH>
17397.zh-Hans:
<start_lip_sync n00210 _normal m00001>……说起来，
还没怎么和你提过天命之女武神的事情啊。<stop_lip_animation n00210 CLOSE_MOUTH>
17397.zh-Hant:
<start_lip_sync n00210 _normal m00001>……說起來，幾乎沒向你交待過
天命之女武神的事吧。<stop_lip_animation n00210 CLOSE_MOUTH>

17398.en:
I will never forget the day I met him. I will never forget the day I met him. The sun, which was not supposed to
rise, appeared in front of me as I fell during a night attack by the enemy.
17398.ja:
<start_lip_sync n00210 _normal m00001>「ボクは　あの方に出会った日を　忘れはしない。
　あの日……　敵の夜襲に倒れた　ボクの前に
　昇るはずのない　太陽が現れたのだ。<stop_lip_animation n00210 CLOSE_MOUTH>
17398.ko:
<start_lip_sync n00210 _normal m00001>: 그분을 처음 만난 날이 난 잊히지 않는다.
　그날 밤…… 적의 습격에 쓰러진 내 앞에
　떠오를 리 없는 태양이 나타났지.<stop_lip_animation n00210 CLOSE_MOUTH>
17398.zh-Hans:
<start_lip_sync n00210 _normal m00001>我永远忘不了与她相遇的那一天。
那天……在敌人的夜袭中倒下的我面前，
升起了本不该出现的太阳。<stop_lip_animation n00210 CLOSE_MOUTH>
17398.zh-Hant:
<start_lip_sync n00210 _normal m00001>我永遠忘不了與她相遇的那一天。
那天……在敵人的夜襲中倒下的我面前，
升起了本不該出現的太陽。<stop_lip_animation n00210 CLOSE_MOUTH>

17399.en: O Sigurd, the mighty warrior! Wake up.
17399.ja:
<center>勇猛なる戦士　シグルドよ。
目を　覚ましなさい……。
17399.zh-Hans:
<center>勇猛的战士希格尔德啊。
醒来吧……
17399.zh-Hant:
<center>勇猛的戰士希格爾德啊。
醒來吧……

17400.en:
Your souls, scattered in battle, are
precious. From now on, you will lead a
new life as a Valhalla warrior.
17400.ja:
<center>……戦いに散った　あなたの魂は　尊きもの。
これからは　ヴァルハラの戦士として
新たな人生を　歩むのです……。
17400.ko:
<center>……전투에서 스러진 당신의 혼은 고귀한 것.
앞으로는 발할라의 전사로서
새로운 인생을 시작하세요…….
17400.zh-Hans:
<center>……你身虽亡，但灵魂却依旧充满力量。
从现在起，作为瓦尔哈拉的战士，
开始新的人生吧……
17400.zh-Hant:
<center>……戰死沙場的你擁有崇高的靈魂。
今後就作為瓦爾哈拉的戰士，
開始新的人生吧……

17401.en:
<start_lip_sync n00210 _normal m00001>And so I was reborn as a Valhalla
warrior in the service of the
beautiful and noble Fate's War Maiden.<stop_lip_animation n00210 CLOSE_MOUTH>
17401.ja:
<start_lip_sync n00210 _normal m00001>「そうして　ボクは……
　美しく気高い　天命の戦乙女に仕える
　ヴァルハラの戦士に　生まれ変わった。<stop_lip_animation n00210 CLOSE_MOUTH>
17401.ko:
<start_lip_sync n00210 _normal m00001>: 그렇게 나는……
　아름답고 기품 있는 천명의 여전사를 모시는
　발할라의 전사로 다시 태어났지.<stop_lip_animation n00210 CLOSE_MOUTH>
17401.zh-Hans:
<start_lip_sync n00210 _normal m00001>就这样，我……
便转生成为瓦尔哈拉的战士，
侍奉那美丽又高洁的天命之女武神。<stop_lip_animation n00210 CLOSE_MOUTH>
17401.zh-Hant:
<start_lip_sync n00210 _normal m00001>就這樣……
我便轉生成為瓦爾哈拉的戰士，
侍奉那美麗又高潔的天命之女武神。<stop_lip_animation n00210 CLOSE_MOUTH>

17402.en:
<start_lip_sync n00210 _normal m00001>My life belongs to Fate's War Maiden.
I cannot lose her.<stop_lip_animation n00210 CLOSE_MOUTH>
17402.ja:
<start_lip_sync n00210 _normal m00001>「ボクの命は　天命の戦乙女のもの。
　決して　あの方を失うわけには　いかないのだ。<stop_lip_animation n00210 CLOSE_MOUTH>
17402.ko:
<start_lip_sync n00210 _normal m00001>: 나의 목숨은 천명의 여전사의 것.
　절대로 그분을 잃을 수는 없다.<stop_lip_animation n00210 CLOSE_MOUTH>
17402.zh-Hans:
<start_lip_sync n00210 _normal m00001>我的生命属于天命之女武神。
我决不能让她有任何闪失。<stop_lip_animation n00210 CLOSE_MOUTH>
17402.zh-Hant:
<start_lip_sync n00210 _normal m00001>我的生命屬於天命之女武神。
絕不能讓她有任何閃失。<stop_lip_animation n00210 CLOSE_MOUTH>

17403.en:
<start_lip_sync n00210 _normal m00001>Thanks <pc>. Thanks to YOU, I
was able to find Sage Thor of Chikara.<stop_lip_animation n00210 CLOSE_MOUTH>
17403.ja:
<start_lip_sync n00210 _normal m00001>「ありがとう　<pc>。
　キミのおかげで　チカラの賢人トールを
　見つけだすことができた。<stop_lip_animation n00210 CLOSE_MOUTH>

17404.en:
<start_lip_sync n00210 _normal m00001>With this, we have taken a big step
forward in our quest to recapture
Fate's War Maiden.<stop_lip_animation n00210 CLOSE_MOUTH>
17404.ja:
<start_lip_sync n00210 _normal m00001>「これで　天命の戦乙女の奪還に向けて
　ボクたちは　大きな一歩を　踏みだせたのだ。<stop_lip_animation n00210 CLOSE_MOUTH>

17405.en:
Sage Thor is now using his divination skills to locate the remaining three wise men. Leave it to him and get some
rest.
17405.ja:
<start_lip_sync n00210 _normal m00001>「今は　賢人トールが　占術を使って
　残りの三賢人の居場所を　探してくれている。
　彼にまかせ　休息を取っていてくれ。<stop_lip_animation n00210 CLOSE_MOUTH>
